mapper.select: SELECT DEPTID k, DEPTNAME v, DEPTCODE code FROM bg_sys_dept WHERE PDEPTCODE = '90000110' AND VALID = '1' AND src IN (0, 2) ORDER BY SORT_ID
select s.DEPT_ID,d.DEPTNAME from BG_YY_ITEM_SECOND_DEPT s LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT d ON d.DEPTID = s.DEPT_ID where s.SECOND_CATEGORY_ID=#{itemSecondId} and d.VALID='1' and s.VALID='1'
select IF_SIGN from BG_YY_ITEM_SECOND s where s.uuid=#{itemSecondId}
select IF_LEADER_APPROVE from BG_YY_ITEM_SECOND s where s.uuid=#{itemSecondId}
select USERID,USERNAME,USERALIAS,HRDEPTNAME from BG_SYS_USER where username = #{userName} and VALID='1'
SELECT STAFF_ID FROM bg_yy_Approve WHERE NODE_TYPE = '5' AND VALID = '1'

SELECT approve_user FROM TB_WL_AUDIT_USER WHERE APPROVE_ID = #{approveId} AND APPROVE_EXPAND_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT APPROVE_USER FROM TB_WL_APPROVE_EXPAND WHERE AUDIT_FLAG = '1' AND APPROVE_ID = #{approveId}
SELECT DEPT_ID FROM BG_YY_ITEM_SECOND_DEPT WHERE SECOND_CATEGORY_ID = #{secondItemId} AND VALID = '1'

SELECT decode(t.type, 2, t.pdeptid, 1, t.deptid) deptId, decode(t.type, 2, t.pdeptname, 1, t.deptname) deptName FROM bg_sys_dept t WHERE t.deptcode IN (SELECT hrdeptcode FROM bg_sys_user WHERE userid IN ( SELECT u.APPROVE_USER FROM TB_WL_AUDIT_USER u LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE a ON a.ID = u.APPROVE_ID WHERE a.APPLY_ID = (SELECT apply_id FROM TB_WL_BUSINESS_R_APPLY WHERE BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId} AND CREATE_TIME = (SELECT max(CREATE_TIME) FROM TB_WL_BUSINESS_R_APPLY WHERE BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId} AND VALID = '1')) AND u.APPROVE_EXPAND_ID IS NOT NULL ) AND valid = '1') AND t.valid = '1'
